verbose_text: The addition of anti-TF monoclonal antibodies to PPP with MPCs and MPC-dMPs significantly prolonged the lag time and ttPeak and decreased the MRI and the peak of thrombin generation compared with control experiments without anti-TF antibodies.
evidence: anti-TF monoclonal antibodies to PPP with MPCs and MPC-dMPs significantly prolonged the lag time and ttPeak and decreased the MRI and the peak of thrombin
